Shuowen 说文解字: 璵璠魯之寶玉從王番聲孔子曰美哉璵璠遠而望之奐若也近而視之瑟若也一則理勝二則孚勝

Compound 璠 from (rem- 王 wáng) from jade 玉 yù and phonetic sort-rice 番 fān.

璠字的基本解释

璠
fán
美玉。

璠字的汉语字典释义

[①]［fán］
［《廣韻》附袁切，平元，奉。］
美玉。

璠字的康熙字典解释

【午集上】【玉字部】　璠； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页742第11
【唐韻】附袁切【集韻】符袁切，?音煩。【說文】璵璠，魯之寶玉。孔子曰：美哉，璵璠。遠而望之，奐若也。近而視之，瑟若也。一則理勝，二則孚勝。【左傳·定五年】陽虎將以璵璠斂。【註】璵璠，美玉。【阮德如答嵆康詩】良玉須切磋，璵璠就其形。　又【集韻】【韻會】?孚袁切，音翻。義同。　又【韻補】叶汾沿切，音近楩。【潘尼·贈陸機詩】今子徂東，何以贈旃。寸晷惟寶，豈無璵璠。　又叶孚音切，音近芬。【陸雲·贈顧秀才詩】藻不彫樸，華不變淳。有斐君子，如珪如璠。

考證：〔【說文】璵璠，魯之寶玉。孔子曰，美哉，璠璵。〕　謹照原文璠璵改璵璠。〔【左傳·定五年】陽虎將璵璠斂。〕　謹照原文將字下增以字。
璠字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
璠字的起名意思

：指美玉，多用于形容女子容貌秀丽。

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Won Collection 1] [Jade Character Department] 　璠; Kangxi Strokes: 17; Page Number: Page 742-11
[Tang Yun] with Yuan Qi [Ji Yun] Fu Yuan Qi, troubled by the sound. [Said the text] Yunpi, Lu Zhibaoyu. Confucius said: beautiful, 玙璠. Looking far away, Huan Ruo also. Looking closely at it, Seruo also. One reason wins, and two fu wins. [Zuo Zhuan·Ding Five Years] Yanghu will converge with a feather. [Note] Yunpi, beautiful jade. [Ruan Deru answers the poems of Rongkang] Liangyu must learn from each other, and the 玙璠 is in its shape.　 [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui]? Fu Yuan Qi, the sound is translated. The same meaning.　[Rhyme Filling] Ye Fen cuts along, the sound is close. 【Penny·Gift Lu Ji Poems】Today's son, why don't you give it to me? An inch of sundial is a treasure, is there no 璠璠.　 Ye Fu's sound cut again, and the sound is close to Fen. [Lu Yun·Poems for Gu Xiucai] The algae are not simple, but the Hua is not pure. There are gentlemen of Fei, such as Gui, such as Fan. Textual research: [[Said the text] Yunpi, Lu Zhibaoyu. Confucius said, beautiful, Piyun. 〔〕 　 I would like to change the original version of the 璠玙 to the 玙璠. 〔【Zuo Zhuan·Ding five years】Yanghu will conquer. 〕　I would like to add the following words according to the original text.
